author: PTI
title: China poses substantial threat to Americans' health, way of life: Mike Pompeo
description: US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo, a known critic of China, said China's delay in sharing information about the virus had created risks to people worldwide. "The CCP also threatens to undermine the free and open order that has underpinned our mutual prosperit…
content: WASHINGTON: China's ruling Communist Party poses a substantial threat to Americans' health and their way of life, US Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said on Thursday, blasting Beijing for the intentional "disinformation campaign" and trying to deflect from its… [+1609 chars]
